title: Collective Ramblings Volume One
description: Twenty stories, four genres. See where these talented and varied authors take your imagination. Travel to worlds with superheroes, mystical, time-warped islands, a world where criminals are tortured to death, and a city plagued by mosquitoes. Collective Ramblings Volume One is the first in an annual short story compilation by Rambunctious Ramblings Publishing Inc.
author: John Langmaack
